title: Ozark National Scenic Riverways: Work With Us
body: Work With Us         Enjoy what you do and you'll be happy at least five days out of every seven!   Positions open at Ozark National Scenic Riverways will be advertised on www.usajobs.gov. This site also has Government jobs in many agencies around the country. People looking for ideas about beginning a career in Natural Resources might want to look at our "Career Tips" page. It has information on suggested coursework, how to get your foot in the door, and helpful websites for jobs and schools in natural resource fields.   Career Tips (Suggestions for people looking at natural resources as a career. Has websites for jobs as well as "Ranger Schools.")  Â    "The first river you paddle runs through the rest of your life. It bubbles up in pools and eddies to remind you who you are". - (Lynn Noel)
